title: /need calls have too much stuff in them

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
We could do just fine with `FileInfoTrunc`
I don't see a reason why we'd need block hashes:

